pr_title: Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

timeline.message:
Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

Utilize newer Java language features to simplfy code by using Object.equals() rather than equals().

timeline.author: EdColeman

replies.bodyText: Thanks @EdColeman . Updated to add further simplification and updated hashCode.
replies.author: jmark99

replies.bodyText: I think the same thing could apply to the other 2 classes.
replies.author: EdColeman

replies.bodyText: @EdColeman pushed up changes to the other two classes.
replies.author: jmark99

timeline.message:
Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

Simplified equals() method a bit further and replaced existing hashCode
method with Objects.hash()

Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

Updated the equals() and hashcode() methods in InputTableConfig and
Condition classes.

timeline.bodyText: This was changed from instanceof to the use of getClass(), which is not the same. The latter is more narrow. I think it should be changed back to instanceof, although the check for null would be redundant, since instanceof is always false if it's null.
timeline.author: ctubbsii

replies.bodyText: @ctubbsii, I reverted the aforementioned check back to its original form. Thanks.
replies.author: jmark99

timeline.message:
Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

Reverted getClass() back to original instanceof chedck in
Condition.java.

timeline.author: ctubbsii
